name: Jay Leno
monologue: Arizona’s new immigration law was supposed to go into effect already, but it was delayed. They would have had to cancel next week’s all-star baseball game.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: The U.S. government is saying that Arizona’s immigration law is unconstitutional. Legally, there’s only one entity that can determine who can come work in this country, and that’s Wal-Mart.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: Lindsay Lohan is starring in a new reality show. I believe it’s called “Party’s Over.”

name: Jay Leno
monologue: According to Newsweek, Osama bin Laden is a big fan of World Cup soccer, and he likes to watch it from his cave. Why can’t we find him? How many caves have a satellite dish?
